body_html: OK, @Keno I would marginally prefer not to add xrt_server.cc because if it gets checked in then it will have to be supported forever, but I don't feel strongly enough to block you making progress if it's too inconvenient for you to switch to using grpc_tensorflow_server.cc. Let me know what you think!
body_text: OK, @Keno I would marginally prefer not to add xrt_server.cc because if it gets checked in then it will have to be supported forever, but I don't feel strongly enough to block you making progress if it's too inconvenient for you to switch to using grpc_tensorflow_server.cc. Let me know what you think!
body: OK, @Keno I would marginally prefer not to add xrt_server.cc because if it gets checked in then it will have to be supported forever, but I don't feel strongly enough to block you making progress if it's too inconvenient for you to switch to using grpc_tensorflow_server.cc. Let me know what you think!
